doc.previous: As of January 2005 up to 10 of telephone subscribers in Japan and South Korea have switched to this digital telephone service A January 2005 Newsweek article suggested that Internet telephony may be the next big thing 9 As of 2006 many VoIP companies offer service to consumers and businesses
doc.after: From a customer perspective IP telephony uses a high bandwidth Internet connection and specialized customer premises equipment to transmit telephone calls via the Internet or any modern private data network The customer equipment may be an analog telephone adapter ATA which interfaces a conventional analog telephone to the IP networking equipment or it may be an IP Phone that has the networking and interface technology built into the desk top set and provides the traditional familiar parts of a telephone the handset the dial or keypad and a ringer in a package that usually resembles a standard telephone set
